00001 def indCmp(i1, i2):
00002     return cmp(i1.fitness, i2.fitness)
00003 
00004 def elitist(oldPop, newPop):
00005     pop = []
00006     pop.extend(oldPop)
00007     pop.extend(newPop)
00008     pop.sort(indCmp, reverse=True)
00009     return pop[0:len(oldPop)]
